about_the_game: I. Game background In the game "Your Majesty's Arrival", players will travel back to ancient times and become emperors. The game constructs a huge and detailed ancient world with rich historical and cultural background, a complete map of the ancient world, and every scene from the majestic court to the beautiful harem is vivid. When players ascend the throne, they will be at peace in a corner, where the world is divided and the situation is complex and changeable. There are various forces fighting inside and strong enemies watching outside. They need to govern the country with wisdom and strategy, and create their own prosperous dynasty. II. Gameplay Political Handling: Players need to personally attend the court to handle various political matters. From the appointment and removal of officials, local construction, tax adjustments, to military expeditions, diplomatic decisions, etc., all need to be weighed one by one. Reasonable selection of talents and appointment of capable officials can improve the efficiency of national governance; formulating appropriate tax policies can ensure the abundance of the national treasury; and in terms of diplomacy, various means of cooperation and cooperation should be flexibly used to continuously expand territory. The management of the harem: The emperor's harem cannot be ignored. Players need to deal with the relationships between the concubines in the harem, as different concubines have unique personalities and skills. At the same time, as the emperor, they also need to shoulder the responsibility of inheriting offspring, giving birth to and cultivating princes and princesses, marrying with the offspring of other players, and getting married or enfeoffed when they grow up. The prince will play an important role in the prosperity of the empire. City Construction: Players need to plan the construction of the capital and various cities, and cannot neglect all aspects of agriculture, commerce, and industry. Agricultural facilities can be built to ensure food supply, workshops can be built to promote the development of handicrafts, and commercial facilities can be built to increase trade income. At the same time, attention should be paid to infrastructure building such as urban security to enhance the prosperity and stability of the city. Military War: Building a strong army is the key to defending the country. Players need to recruit soldiers, assemble the army, appoint commanders and generals, and enhance the combat effectiveness of the army. Reasonably allocate the army, formulate strategies, unify the Central Plains, conquer neighboring countries, and expand territory. III. Game features and objectives This is a fully 3D highly immersive emperor simulation game. The game simulates the emperor's experience of managing and governing the country, using strategies and management methods to continuously develop. The goal is to unify the Central Plains, continuously expand territory while also taking into account the governance and development of the territory, and strive to create a prosperous empire.

From the first perspective of the simulated emperor's accession to the throne, he governs the government, manages officials and concubines, raises children, conquers the world, and experiences the life of an emperor.
